text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Yep but all who attend must first sign waiver to not sue if they contract the coronavirus at this or any of his rallies, so much for everything is back to normal and NC was being unreasonable with trying to remain safe. Hypocrisy at its best.
